verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's only one Lord, and there's only one light.
There's only one way, that's to pay the price.
Are you ready? Are you ready?
To pay the price to walk in life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's only one joy in this whole wide world.
That's to know the Lord, and to walk in His word.
Are you ready? Are you ready?
To pay the price to walk in life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's no time to lose, for the hour is late.
The Day of the Lord is approaching and there's no time to waste.
Are you ready? Are you ready?
To pay the price to walk in life.
